landing.title: Train conversations that truly matter
landing.lead: Practice with AI agents and receive detailed feedback.

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Registration gives you immediate access to the agent catalog.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Send a password recovery link to your email.
resetPassword.successMessage: Check your email. We've sent password reset instructions.

updatePassword.title: Set New Password
updatePassword.subtitle: Enter a new password to complete the reset.
updatePassword.errorTooShort: Password should be at least 8 characters.

auth.loginDescription: Already have an account? Enter your credentials

agents.title: Agent Catalog
agents.subtitle: Choose a conversation scenario and start training
agents.noAgentsDescription: Contact your administrator to add agents.

agent.instructions: Read the brief instructions and start training.

sessions.title: My Conversations
sessions.subtitle: Browse your conversation history and feedback
sessions.noSessionsDescription: Start your first conversation with an AI agent
sessions.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
sessions.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. All data, feedback and transcript will be deleted.

session.notesPlaceholder: Add your notes about this conversation...

form.title: Title
form.instructionsPlaceholder: Enter instructions for the user before starting the conversation...
form.instructionsHelp: These instructions will be displayed to the user on the agent page before starting the conversation.

sessions.title: All Conversations
sessions.description: Overview of all conversations in the system
sessions.searchPlaceholder: Search by title or user email...
sessions.resultsCount: {count, plural, =0 {No results} one {# result} other {# results}}

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage branding, landing page, email notifications and ElevenLabs integration

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.description: Set how long to keep data (0 = indefinitely)

branding.title: Branding
branding.primaryColorHelp: Choose the color to be used as the main application color
branding.formatInfo: Format: PNG, JPG, WEBP | Max size: 2MB | Recommended height: 80px
branding.fileTooLarge: File is too large ({size}MB). Maximum size is 2MB.

landing.title: Landing Page
landing.serviceNameHelp: Service name displayed in header (e.g. Parley)
landing.headline: Headline
landing.headlineHelp: Main headline on landing page - large font (e.g. 'Train conversations that really matter')
landing.subClaimHelp: Additional slogan under headline - medium font (e.g. 'Practice with AI agents and get detailed feedback')
landing.leadHelp: Supporting text under sub-claim - small font

email.title: Email Notifications
email.enabledHelp: Enable or disable email notifications for users
email.senderNameHelp: Name that will appear as the email sender
email.testEmailHelp: We will send a one-off confirmation message to this address.
email.testEmailDisabled: Enable email notifications before sending a test email
email.testEmailRequired: Provide a valid email address to send the test message

elevenlabs.title: ElevenLabs Integration
elevenlabs.description: Paste the webhook secret generated in ElevenLabs. The secret is stored securely in the database and used to verify incoming conversations.
elevenlabs.secretHelp: Paste the value from the ElevenLabs webhook settings.
elevenlabs.secretHelpExisting: Secret already configured. Replace it only if you generated a new one in ElevenLabs.
